title: UCF Returns from Spring Break
author: johnsmith

comments.author: johnmiller
comments.content: Spring break was so much fun!

comments.author: graciejane
comments.content: I needed that time to relax.

content: UCF students return from Spring Break from 3/13 - 3/19. Classes begin again on 3/20.

title: Class Registration Is Opening Soon
author: jackiegreen

comments.author: samrose
comments.content: I need to plan my schedule soon.

comments.author: johnmiller
comments.content: Last year of classes for me!

content: Students make sure you schedule an appointment with your advisor to plan your courses for the oncoming semesters.

title: Register to Graduate Spring 2023
author: johnsmith

comments.author: jacksmith
comments.content: I might need to take another semester.

content: If you are planning to complete all requirements for your degree by the end of the Spring 2023 semester, you should file your Intent to Graduate (ITG) form online.

title: Job Opportunity for NSCM Students
author: murphyjones

comments.author: alexcoleman
comments.content: I need this job so badly!

comments.author: tiffanygrey
comments.content: I have all these requirements! Applying soon.

content: The Office of Student Involvement (OSI) is currently looking to hire a well-versed Web Designer!
